course_title: Integrated Adult-Geriatric and Mental Health Practicum
class_notes: This section is for MN InEmory semester 2 students only. Clinical or Simulation on Mon, Tues, Wed, Saturday and/or Sunday.
course_description: The practicum focuses on adult-geriatric patients across a care continuum integrating acute, chronic, and mental health needs. Students will provide care to patients, families, and communities with emphasis on evidence-based interventions, inter-professional collaboration, and outcomes.
prerequisites: NRSG 510MN as prerequisite and NRSG 533MN/NRSG 536MN as corequisites, or equivalent transfer credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 1542, Section #: 300, Type: PRA, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
